MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: ms.assetid: CAC6A7C7-3348-4EC4-8327-D47EB6E0C238 title: Access the SD card description: You can store and access non-essential data on an optional microSD card, especially on low-cost mobile devices that have limited internal storage.
